docs:
# Getting started with Drip 

To use any of the above modules, you need to connect your Drip account to Integromat. If you do not have a Drip account yet, you can create one at [drip.com](https://www.drip.com/).

## Connecting the Drip service to Integromat

To connect your Drip account to Integromat, follow the general instructions for [Connecting to services](https://support.integromat.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001990194#create-a-connection). 

Click the **Continue** button. Integromat will redirect you to the Drip website and you will be prompted to grant Integromat access to your account.

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009137054/file.jpeg)

Allow the access by clicking the **Authorize** button. Afterwards, you will be redirected back to the Integromat administration. Now you can continue and finish your scenario.

## Generating your own Client ID and Client Secret values

When creating a connection, you can display the advanced options and you will be requested to enter your Client ID and Client Secret. To get these values, you need to register your application (Integromat) under your user settings in Drip.

To do this, go to [https://www.getdrip.com/user/applications](https://www.getdrip.com/user/applications/). Enter a name for your new application and click the **Create Application** button. 

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009182513/file.jpeg)

In the form that appears type `https://www.integromat.com/oauth/cb/app` in the Callback URL field and click **Save**. 

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009182533/file.jpeg)

Go back to applications and activate your newly created application. Clicking the **Edit** button will display the requested Client ID and Client Secret.

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009182553/file.jpeg)

Copy these values to Integromat and click the **Continue(Save)** button. 

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009182593/file.jpeg)

UpdateSubscriber.expectJsonc:
[
	{
		"help": "Enter the subscriber's email address.",
		"name": "subscriberEmail",
		"type": "email",
		"label": "Subscriber's email",
		"required": true
	},
	{
		"help": "Select an account identifier.",
		"name": "accountId",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Account",
		"options": {
			"store": "rpc://RpcAccounts",
			"nested": [
				{
					"help": "Enter an Object containing custom field data. E.g. { name: Doe }",
					"name": "customFields",
					"spec": [
						{
							"help": "Select or map a custom field name.",
							"name": "key",
							"type": "select",
							"label": "Name",
							"options": "rpc://RpcCustomFields",
							"editable": true,
							"required": true
						},
						{
							"help": "Enter a custom field value.",
							"name": "value",
							"type": "text",
							"label": "Value"
						}
					],
					"type": "array",
					"label": "Custom fields",
					"required": false
				},
				{
					"help": "Enter an Array containing one or more tags. E.g. [Customer, SEO]",
					"name": "tags",
					"spec": {
						"help": "Select or map a tag.",
						"type": "select",
						"label": "Tag name",
						"options": "rpc://RpcTags",
						"editable": true,
						"required": true
					},
					"type": "array",
					"label": "Tags",
					"required": false
				},
				{
					"help": "Enter an Array containing one or more tags to be removed from the subscriber. E.g. [Customer, SEO]",
					"name": "removeTags",
					"spec": {
						"help": "Select or map a tag.",
						"type": "select",
						"label": "Tag name",
						"options": "rpc://RpcTags",
						"editable": true,
						"required": true
					},
					"type": "array",
					"label": "Tags to remove",
					"required": false
				}
			]
		},
		"required": true
	},
	{
		"help": "Enter the subscriber's time zone (in Olson format). Defaults to Etc/UTC",
		"name": "timeZone",
		"type": "timezone",
		"label": "Timezone",
		"required": true,
		"editable": true
	},
	{
		"help": "Enter a new email address for the subscriber.",
		"name": "newEmail",
		"type": "email",
		"label": "New email",
		"required": false
	},
	{
		"help": "Enter a Boolean specifiying whether we should attach a lead score to the subscriber (when lead scoring is enabled). Defaults to true. Note: This flag used to be called potential_lead, which we will continue to accept for backwards compatibility",
		"name": "prospect",
		"type": "boolean",
		"label": "Prospect",
		"required": false
	},
	{
		"help": "Enter an Integer specifying the starting value for lead score calculation for this subscriber. Defaults to 30",
		"name": "baseLeadSource",
		"type": "number",
		"label": "Base lead source",
		"required": false
	}
]

CreateOrUpdateOrder.name: CreateOrUpdateOrder
CreateOrUpdateOrder.label: Create/Update an Order

expect.help: Select an account identifier.
expect.name: accountId
expect.label: Account

expect.help: Enter the order ID. This is a unique, internal id for the order (generally the primary key generated by the ecommerce platform). To update an existing order, include the provider and order_id for that order in the payload.
expect.name: order_id
expect.label: Order ID

expect.help: Enter the identifier for the provider from which the order data was received in lower snake cased form.
expect.name: provider
expect.label: Provider

expect.help: Select the action.
expect.name: action
expect.label: Action

expect.help: Enter the person's email address. Caution: either person_id or email must be included. If both are included, email is ignored.
expect.name: email
expect.label: Email

expect.help: Enter the unique identifier of a person at Drip. Caution: either person_id or email must be included. If both are included, email is ignored.
expect.name: person_id
expect.label: Person ID

expect.help: Enter the currency. See the URL https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 for details.
expect.name: currency
expect.label: Currency

spec.help: Enter a unique identifier for the product from the provider.
spec.name: product_id
spec.label: Product ID

spec.help: Enter the price of a single product.
spec.name: price
spec.label: Price

CreateOrUpdateOrder.description: Creates or updates an order. If you receive errors please check required parameters in the documentation properly. A provider and an order ID are required. Either a person ID or an email must be included.

description: Take customer experience to the next level with {{integromat}} and Drip. Automate tasks, campaigns, subscriptions and much more with {{integromat}}.
